# seqera_pipeline_secret (Data Source)

Look up a pipeline secret by name.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the pipeline secret to look up.
- `workspace_id` (Number) Workspace numeric identifier.

### Read-Only

- `date_created` (String) Timestamp when the secret was created.
- `last_updated` (String) Timestamp when the secret was last updated.
- `last_used` (String) Timestamp when the secret was last accessed by a workflow.
- `secret_id` (Number) Pipeline secret numeric identifier.
